{"name": "Pleasant Grove Missionary Bapt. Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The schedule changes every month. For schedule updates: Text 'TheGroveATL"  to  4704668552, to get text notifications about distribution every month.

2025 Schedules:
June 14
July 12

September 4
October 11
November 5 (Thanksgiving)
December 20 (Christmas)
Scheules are from 5;30 to 7 30", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/TheGroveAtlanta/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "566 Whitlock Avenue Southwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Marietta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30064", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.95255349999999, "longitude": -84.5692578}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 428-3681", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "For schedule updates: Text 'TheGroveATL'  to  470-466-8552"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
